text: Ben Chaplin (born Benedict John Greenwood; 31 July 1969)Births, Marriages & Deaths Index of England & Wales, 1916â€“2005.; at ancestry.com is an English actor. He was born in Windsor, Berkshire. He is known for his role as a servant in The Remains of the Day. He also starred as Con Wainwright in Feast of July (1995) and as Tom Wingfield in Sam Mendes' stage production of The Glass Menagerie. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Berkshire
title: Ben Chaplin
